title: How do I delete the highlights i recorded?
body: Why can't I delete it!? it's so WEIRD!!!! Guys, please help me. My system is still Windows 7. I didn't upgrade yet. Thxxxxxx

replies.body: Man i took one of my replays and copied on my desktop but i cant delete it now cant cut/paste it or open properties pls help i found a way how to delete from highlights folder but cant delete this one on desktop i really dont want to format my pc
see if this method works. By the way, it have to be the newest client.
tell me if you have questions. I might not reply very quick sorry for that. Wish you can solve it! It bothers me for half a year now..

i know how to delete now! First your lol client have to be the new one, then under your profile, you will see highlights, and then you just delete it! The files will automatically disappear after you delete it under highlights.
Hello, I am having this same issue. Windows 7, cannot delete highlight replays - it just shows a never-ending "delete" load bar... Did you find a solution to this problem? Thanks
You can try to cut and paste it to an USB, if you don't want it to be on your computer. But I don't know if that is gonna work.
No sorry. I can't delete it too. It's not working on both of my accounts. If you found a solution please tell me. Thanks.

Did you mean *Highlights* or *Replays?* If highlights, then you can delete them in the folder they've been stored in, which can be found in this directory:

> **C:\Users\Example_Username\My Documents\League of Legends\Highlights**

Let me know if this helped!
Thanks! I tried but its not working. It keeps staying its deleting but the process bar is not moving.....
Sounds like an issue local to your PC. I'd give your PC a quick reboot and try it again.
Already tried....Not working....Maybe I should switch an account than try again...
Are you playing from an administrator account? If not, you'll want to swap over to your administrator account to attempt the deletion.
I'm not playing on administrator account .I will try on administrator. Thxxxxxxxxxx
